_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: HolaClient-v2.5
author: admin@holaclient.tech
description: An egg for Pterodactyl panel usually used to install HolaClient, Created and Maintained with ❤ by amogus#6200.
startup: if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [[ ! -z ${UNNODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm uninstall ${UNNODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [ -f /home/container/package.json ]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install; fi; /usr/local/bin/node /home/container/{{BOT_JS_FILE}}

variables.name: HolaClient Version
variables.description: The version of HolaClient to install. Default value: "latest".

variables.name: HolaClient Startup File
variables.description: The index file to start the app. Default value: index.js

variables.name: Install Node.JS Packages
variables.description: Additional packages to install. Leave gap after a package.

variables.name: Uninstall Node.JS Packages
variables.description: Node.JS packages to uninstall. Don't uninstall any of the HolaClient's dependencies packages.
